content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. Identify the legal doctrine that is common in both Timbs v. Indiana (2019) and McDonald v. Chicago (2010). Explain how the holding in McDonald was similar to the holding in Timbs. Explain how the decision in Timbs affects the reserve powers of the states.
